Place downloaded minimized vendor files here:
- bootstrap.min.css
- bootstrap.bundle.min.js (or bootstrap.min.js + popper.min.js)
- fontawesome.min.css (or all.min.css from fontawesome package)
- jquery.min.js
- popper.min.js
- toastr.min.css / toastr.min.js

Use official distributions:
Bootstrap: https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/bootstrap@5.3.3/dist/
FontAwesome: https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/font-awesome/6.5.0/css/
Toastr: https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/toastr.js/latest/toastr.min.css
